prompts: Look at your trash can. Draw the topmost item visible right now.
Draw the condensation drops on the outside of your current glass.
If your patience was a rubber band, draw how stretched it is right now.
Look at the nearest window. Draw the most prominent smudge or raindrop on it.
Draw your current mood as a simple weather icon on a sticky note.
Draw the shape of the nearest plant leaf, including any brown spots or tears.
If your motivation was a campfire, draw how big the flames are right now.
Look at your watch or clock. Draw the exact angle of the hands.
Draw the shape of the nearest stain or mark on your desk.
If your to-do list was a stack of pancakes, draw how tall it is.
Draw the exact way your shoelaces are tied or untied now.
Look at the nearest book. Draw the angle it is resting at.
